content: back feet make 1 on each side of turtle back near the tail pick up and knit 4 s cid 415 tches row 1-9 knit row 10 k2tog twice then pass the first s cid 415 tch over the second and pull yarn through to fasten_off weave in all ends and drop him on the floor drip some water on the floor accidentally and take him for a test drive feel free to share your version on instagram using the hashtag #kni cid 414 loorturtle and tag me @4parkerlane_knits © 4parkerlane all rights reserved this pa cid 425 ern is for personal use only you may not copy re distribute or resell this pa cid 425 ern feel free to sell products made from this pa cid 425 ern with credit to designer
